name: Parcel Panic (itch)
description:
The objective of this game is to grab parcels dropped from the buildings and deliver them to their respective destinations. Keep your energy levels stable and deliver as many parcels as you can before you run out of energy!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to drop off package
  • Escape to pause

Mechanics/Rules:

  • Drop off parcel at designated locations as indicated by arrows in front of the building
  • Each building is marked by letters, where Post Office is PO
  • An energy bar will spawn at random intervals, increasing energy by 20%
  • Each parcel that is not picked up reduces energy by 10%
  • The more parcels being held, the more energy is lost
  • Pressing the spacebar will always drop the left-most parcel in the UI
  • Destinations will appear above the parcel in the UI after acquiring but will disappear after a few seconds

Points:

  • A parcel delivered to the correct destination is +1 point
  • A parcel delivered to the incorrect destination is -1 point and 10% energy loss

Notes:

  • The game has an aspect ratio of 16:10, so if the game window is fullscreen-ed, certain UI elements will not scale correctly, so please leave it not fullscreen-ed
  • There is music in the title screen and main game screen
  • The music in the title screen may be bugged, but during gameplay, all the sounds should work
